attributes.action: oppose road tax to none uk resident cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that if any vehicle brought into this country by any person from another country who has a permit to live hear should have the vehicle registered at there uk address and they should have the vehicle tested for road worthiness and should have the vehicle taxed so it can be used on our roads and have appropriate car insurance from a british insurers

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
